title: Enable JS debugging from VS for Edge
body: I was shocked to find that VS 2015 can't debug JS running in Edge (yet it can debug WWAs using EdgeHTML?). I hope this will be fixed soon, but it means that IE 11 is the only option for end-to-end debugging in VS, which is unfortunate.

comments.body: Yes, pleeeeease. Works fine in IE, but I'd love for this to happen in Edge.
Also for Visual Studio Code please (just like Adobe Brackets)

Found out Chrome also is an option to debug from within VS2015, but it is a pain to set up. You have to enable Chrome Remote Debugging by adding parameters while starting Chrome and you have to attach manually from VS2015 to Chrome.
